name: little war ground
description:
2 players simple RTS game. 

The first online game i make with godot engine while learning about game development =)). For the online features i use gotm godot plug-in.

How to play: (Mobile user should play in landscape mode)

- Use Mouse to select builder.

- Select buildings to build.

- Arrow key to control the camera.

- Have fun =)).

This is the first complete prototype game that i make. 

I might not continue develop it, but if anyone interested in the source code here the github link : https://github.com/bovachd/godot_demo_castle_fight

I hope you like it, thank you for playing my game.
